Python.description: High-level, interpreted language known for readability and versatility.
Python.drill_sergeant_take: PERFECT for BEGINNERS! Easy to READ but don't let that make you LAZY!

JavaScript.description: The language of the WEB! If you want to make things MOVE, this is IT!
JavaScript.drill_sergeant_take: JavaScript is EVERYWHERE! Master this and you can CONQUER the web!

Go.description: Concurrent programming language developed by Google.
Go.drill_sergeant_take: Go is LEAN, MEAN, and gets the JOB DONE! Learn this and you're UNSTOPPABLE!

Rust.description: Systems programming language focused on memory safety and concurrency.
Rust.drill_sergeant_take: RUST is for SOLDIERS! The COMPILER will YELL at you just like I do!

C.description: Low-level systems programming language with direct hardware access.
C.drill_sergeant_take: C is the FOUNDATION! Learn this and you'll understand EVERYTHING!

C++.description: Object-oriented systems programming language with high performance.
C++.drill_sergeant_take: C++ is the ADVANCED TRAINING! You ready for this?!

Assembly.description: Low-level language that directly corresponds to machine instructions.
Assembly.drill_sergeant_take: ASSEMBLY is for the ELITE SOLDIERS! This is where the REAL WORK gets done!
Assembly.sample_code:
section .data
    msg db 'Hello, Tux!', 0
section .text
    global _start
_start:
    mov eax, 1
    mov ebx, 0

C#.drill_sergeant_take: C# is POWERFUL and MODERN! Microsoft BUILT this for PROFESSIONALS!

LOLCODE.description: Esoteric programming language based on LOLcat internet meme.
LOLCODE.drill_sergeant_take: LOLCODE is UNCONVENTIONAL! It teaches you to THINK DIFFERENT and HAVE FUN!
LOLCODE.sample_code:
HAI 1.2
    CAN HAS STDIO?
    VISIBLE "HELLO TUX!"
    KTHXBYE
